page.title: 20CLUTTON CHILDREN'S CONCERNS
page.content:
We are very pleased because we now have a BMX track where we can ride our bikes in safety. {The Third World} We have all been thinking about the children in Ethiopia. We raised some money during Christian Aid week.Lots of us also sponsored one of our teachers Mr. Stock who volunteered to shave off his beard and raised over Â£180 for the starving children. All of the children in class 5 and some others and their mothers knitted some tops and blankets to send off to them.
The work for this Domesday Project was compiled by the children in class 5 at Clutton School.
